Product Description

Safe to Use

Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

8 Lighting Modes

This Christmas light has 8 lighting modes: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On.

Memory Function

With the memory function, the string light remembers the last mode. If you like the lighting modes which set up last time, and you don’t need to change the mode when turn on the light again.

Perfect Decoration

This is a good helper for Christmas decoration, you can decorate the house, Christmas tree, etc. It is also an excellent gift for your family and friends.

【8 Lighting Modes】：Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On. Press the button on the plug to change to your favorite modes, plug and play.
【IP44 Waterproof】：IP44 waterproof rating Christmas light withstands the weather like rain and snow and can be used outdoors. Note: The plug is not waterproof.
【Safe Guarantee】：UL certified and compatible with most USA standard sockets. It will not overheat even if it works for a long time, safe to touch.
【A Helper for Christmas Decoration】：This Christmas decoration star Icicle Light with a charming lighting effect is a perfect decoration for the Christmas tree, lawn, and courtyard.

Safe to Use

  • Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.
  • There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

if (!input) {
return ”;

return input.substr(0, length);

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Pattern
Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODES：Put the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALL：Fcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÉCOR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)



【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. A must-have for daily training and playing.
【Adjustable Length & 7 Doorbells】Unlike other puppies supplies on the market, this durable go outside dog bell has a 3-snap design so that the length can be adjusted easily according to your training needs. The 7 bells can make a loud sound to let you notice the dog’s needs and solve them in time.
【Wide Application】With top-quality material, superior craftsmanship, and humane design, these pet training bells are suitable for small, medium, large dogs, or even cats! It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family who love pets and want to train them well.
【What Can You Get】The package comes with 1 x Doggy Train Doorbells. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these puppy accessories and provide a 30-day money-back warranty and 24-house online customer service for all people. What are you waiting for? It’s Time to Do Some Training!

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine’s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
【Warm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control】Including (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. 【IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS】Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
【4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function】Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
【Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape】UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don’t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual

1 x colorful gift box

We wish you can have a colorful holidays

8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control

Christmas string lights come with 8 modes, including combination, in waves,slo-glo,chasing/fade, slow fade,twinkling/flash,sequential, in wave modes.From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

Safe to Touch & IP44 Waterproof

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.IP44 waterproof and designed to withstand bad weather.

Timer & Memory Function

Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. Built in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset everyday.

4 Brightness Levels

Press DIM+/Dim- via remote controller to adjust brightness level (100%-75%-50%-25%) to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

Read more

WIDELY USED INDOOR AND OUTDOORS

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine’s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

4.5

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

KERNOWO LED LIGHTS

All lights what you need

KERNOWO is a professional brand company focusing on home indoor lighting and outdoor lighting.

We are committed to providing customers with high-quality products that are convenient and energy-saving.

You will find many types LED lights you want.

Solar Lights with Remote

106 Solar Lights Outdoor with Independent Solar Panel 2 Pack

Solar Lights Outdoor

Super bright outside solar flood light, perfect for your outdoor use.

KERNOWO led lights

【Four Modes Adjustable】Four adjustable modes by pressing the button on the back of the solar outdoor light and the remote. Mode 1: Auto on at night, and motion sensor off. Mode 2: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and low light after people leave. Mode 3: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and turn off after people leave. Mode 4: Light fashes at night.
【Flexible Use】The solar panel of the solar led lights can be placed independently of the light body, and connected by a 16.5 ft wire to ensure maximum charging. Aslo you can put them together.
【Super Bright Light Beads】Equiped with 106 LED high light beads and an illumination of 180° wide, the solar lights outdoor can provide 500sq.ft and 3000LM lighting. 3000mAh lithium battery has a larger capacity to provide more efficient charging and more lasting lighting.
【Weatherproof & Durable】Built with IP65 Waterproof,the solar panel lights outdoor body is sturdy enough and the wire connection is sealed.It still works well in rainy and cold days and hot summer.




Specification:

  • Quantity: 2 Pack
  • LED Beads: 106 Pcs
  • Brightness: 3000LM
  • Battery Capacity: 3000mAh
  • Material: ABS+PC
  • Waterproof Level: IP65

Solar Wall Lights Outdoor

luces solares para exteriores

1.106 LED 3000LM light gives you super brightness.

2.Independent solar panel gives you more flexible installation.

3.With remote included, you can control the light more conveniently.

4.IP65 waterproof design makes it withstand bad wheather for more durability.

Read more




Large Lighting and Sensoring Range

Solar Motion Sensor Light has 180° wide lighting angle.And large sensoring range of 26.2ft and 120° sensoring angle make you not lose your steps in the dark.

IP65 Waterproof

With IP65 waterproof , solar wall light can be outdoor used. No worry about rainy and cold days.

135° Rotatable Light Head

The light head and solar panel can be 135° adjusted,which means it can charge more effectively and cover more range.

Read more

Price: $46.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Super Bright Lighting

Solar motion sensor lights equipped with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K brightness, suitable as security lighting for your home.

5 Rotatable Lighting Heads

Solar wall lights has 5 swiveling lighting heads,the adjustable lamp cap can freely move up and down, left and right,which can meet various angles of irradiation.

Easy Setup

The solar led outdoor lights are easy installation, no annoying wires connect or adapters,only using the included screws to fix on any exterior & interior wall or all types of material including metal, wood or plastic.

2023 Newest Solar Lights For Outside Inside House – Super Bright LED Motion Detection Floodlights with 5 Lighting Heads

Warm Tips

1. When the solar panel is unplugged from the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2, mode 3 and mode 4 can work both at day and night.

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the “ON” position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Upgraded 4 Lighting Modes: solar motion activated light has 4 lighting modes: Mode 1: the light turn on for 20s when detected movement at night. Mode 2: light turns on in dim mode at night, get brighter for 20s when detected movement. Mode 3: the light will always turn on and stay medium light at night with or without detecting motion. Mode 4: light turns on for 20 seconds when detects movements both in daytime and night.
Innovative 5 Lighting Heads Design: our solar wall lamps is equipped with 5 rotating lighting heads and pivoting solar panels,it can move up and down, left and right, easily adjust the lamp cap,solar panel and motion sensor to any angles as your requirement,up to 360° wide lighting angle,bring you a fantastic lighting experience.
Ultra Bright with 300LED Solar Power Lights: with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K high brightness output,which can fully achieve the brightness required by daily life. equipped with upgraded PIR motion sensor, solar spot lights can detect up to 120 degree with a longer sensor length of 28feet,motion detection solar lights can sense people,animal,cars etc.
All Weather Resistant: solar garden lights is made of durable high-strength ABS material,reaching IP65 waterproof level,which can withstand many kinds of extreme weather, such as snow, frost,rain and high temperature etc,great led exterior flood lights for fence, balcony, pathway, patio,porch,deck,street,stairs,steps,yard etc
